mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fifth grand concert of Signorina Adelina Patti, the musical phenomenon: Maurice Strakosch has the pleasure to announce to his friends, and the public in general, that he has engaged Signorina Adelina Patti, not yet eight years old .. on Tuesday evening, Oct. 12th, 1852, at the New Assembly Rooms
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: "The Printing Office, Thirs Story Sun Iron Building)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Program, with advertisements for compositions by Strakosch on p. [4]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Printed on yellow paper, all text within an ornamental border. From the Papers of the Clement and Dickinson families, MSS 2819.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Patti, Adelina, 1843-1919
